SHARDS.summary: Get array of cluster slots to node mappings
SHARDS.complexity: O(N) where N is the total number of cluster nodes

reply_schema.description: a nested list of a map of hash ranges and shard nodes describing individual shards

slots.description: an even number element array specifying the start and end slot numbers for slot ranges owned by this shard

nodes.description: a set of key/value pairs (even/odd indexes) that describe the nodes details
